name: AMBIZ
description: AMBIZ was established in 17th of August 2018 starting the venture by establishing a quality apprenticeship program, with no CV & GPA. Through the development of AMBIZ’s own agility assessment tools which allow us to identify talents’ key capacities and match their fitness with the company needs. In 2020, the continuous development of the agility assessment attracted companies to trust AMBIZ as their partner for organizational transformation & development.  AMBIZ has helped 130+ companies in 20+ industries and 50.000+ talents.

enhanced_description: Established on August 17th, 2018, AMBIZ began its journey by pioneering a quality apprenticeship program that evaluates talent without relying on traditional CVs or GPAs. This was made possible through the development of AMBIZ's proprietary agility assessment tools, designed to identify key talent capacities and effectively match them with specific company needs. By 2020, the continued success and refinement of these agility assessments led companies to engage AMBIZ as a trusted partner for broader organizational transformation and development initiatives. AMBIZ offers thorough organizational assessments to analyze strengths, identify areas for improvement, and pinpoint strategic opportunities. They also specialize in change management, guiding organizations through transformative journeys to ensure smooth transitions and optimize performance, alongside providing various learning solutions. To date, AMBIZ has successfully assisted over 130 companies across more than 20 industries and impacted over 50,000 talents.
competitive_advantages: Proprietary agility assessment tools for talent evaluation
Unique apprenticeship program model that bypasses traditional CV and GPA requirements
Expertise in talent identification, organizational assessment, change management, and learning solutions
Proven track record with over 130 companies and 50,000 talents impacted
Ability to deliver global impact through localized practices
implementation_scenarios: Consultative partnership for organizational transformation and development
Service-led implementation of assessment and learning programs
roi_benefits: Optimized organizational performance through effective transformation and development
Smoother organizational transitions and reduced disruption
